Author: naturally_sourced
Text: You pay rent! You pay to use that part of the fridge. I'm sorry, but that's so disrespectful of your roommates

Author: n0kikin0ki
Text: when i had roommates, we all had assigned shelves in the fridge. we also had assigned cabinets in the kitchen for cooking stuff and non-perishables. it is absolutely not fair that they are hoarding the fridge. if you are splitting the cost of utilities (which includes power for the fridge), you deserve space for your belongings. you should bring this up.      also, that lady sounds weird.
